title: Fitness - Fitness Booking Platform
description: Fitness is a modern fitness and training platform that allows users to explore fitness classes, book training slots, communicate via forums, and pay securely. Trainers can manage their profiles, add available slots, and track bookings. Admins have full control over the system with analytics and management tools
challenges: Developed a role-based access system forAdmin, Trainer, and Member to manage permissions securely
Implemented trainer booking, slot availability and Stripe payment integration for seamless user experience.

title: RideX - Ride Sharing Platform
description: RideX is a smart ride-sharing platform that connects riders and passengers in real-time. It provides seamless trip management, intelligent ride tracking, rider earnings overview, and secure authentication. Designed with a clean and responsive interface for a smooth user experience.
challenges: Developed a real-time ride tracking system that allows users and riders to view each other’s live location on Google Maps.
Implemented secure authentication and authorization using Firebase and JWT for multiple user roles (Admin, Rider, User).
Created Rider Dashboard featuring available rides access, live tracking, and ride history for efficient management.

title: Profast - Delivery Tracker App
description: A full-stack parcel delivery management system where users can create parcels, riders can manage deliveries, and admins can track the overall system efficiently.
challenges: Implemented role-based access and task assignments for Admin, Rider, and User.
Enabled real-time parcel tracking and status updates.

title: Open Journal
description: Excited to launch my new blog platform where users can browse, save their favorite posts, and enjoy a clean UI with dark mode support. Built using React, MongoDB, and Firebase Hosting. Would love to hear your thoughts!
challenges: Developed blog management features including adding blogs, writing reviews, andwishlist functionality.
Secure authentication with JWT for different user roles
Implemented dark mode/light mode toggle for improved user experience.

title: Lawyer Appoinment
description: A web application where users can easily book appointments with lawyers online. This project is built using React, Tailwind CSS, and other modern tools to ensure a smooth and responsive user experience.
challenges: DPrevented multiple bookings for the same lawyer, with all booking data stored locally.
Implemented a chart displaying each lawyer’s earnings based on their bookings.

title: Task Nest
description: TaskNest is a full-stack task management web application that allows users to register, log in, and manage their tasks with an interactive and responsive UI. Built with React, Firebase, TailwindCSS, and more, it demonstrates both frontend development and integration with backend services.
challenges: Built a task management system with real-time updates using Firebase Firestore, allowing users to create, edit, and delete tasks instantly.
Designed a fully responsive and visually appealing interface using TailwindCSS for optimal user experience across devices.
